metadata.title: CVE-2019-8524 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memoryhandling. This issue is fixed in iOS 12.2, tvOS 12.2, Safari 12.1, iTunes12.9.4 for Windows, iCloud for Windows 7.11. Processing maliciously craftedweb content may lead to arbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8524` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.24.1-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.24.1-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.24.1-1
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.24.1-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.24.1-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.24.1-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.24.1-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.24.1-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.24.1-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.24.1-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.24.1-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.24.1-1
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.24.1-1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.24.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.24.1-1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
